description: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.
name: Giant Sand Worm

flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.
name: Stand Against Darkness
description: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.

name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
description: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!
name: Ancient Shieldbearer

flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.
name: Forbidden Flame
description: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.

name: Forbidden Shaping
description: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.

flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.
name: Forbidden Healing
description: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"
name: Herald Volazj

flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"
name: DOOM!
description: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
flavor: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.
name: Hallazeal the Ascended
N'Zoth's First Mate
description: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.

name: Undercity Huckster
description: Deathrattle: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).

flavor: SEE YA DARKNESS!
name: Renounce Darkness
description: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.
name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind

flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.
name: Tentacles for Arms
description: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.

flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.
name: Infest
description: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
description: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.

flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."
name: Shadow Word: Horror
description: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.

flavor: Y'shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.
name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
description:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Beast, draw
a card.
Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.
name: Steward of Darkshire

description: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a   1/1 Murloc.'
flavor: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!
name: Vilefin Inquisitor
Thing from Below
description:
[x]Taunt
Costs (1) less for each
Totem you've summoned
this game.

name: Master of Evolution
description: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.

name: Ravaging Ghoul
description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.

name: Mire Keeper
description:
[x]Choose One -Summon a
2/2 Slime; or Gain an
empty Mana Crystal.

name: Hammer of Twilight
description: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Elemental.

flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.
name: Blood Warriors
description: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.

flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.
name: Call of the Wild
description: Summon all three Animal Companions.

flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.
name: Spreading Madness
description: Deal 9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.
name: Cho'gall

description: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.
name: Possessed Villager

flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.
name: Wisps of the Old Gods
description: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.

flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.
name: Thistle Tea
description: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.

name: Embrace the Shadow
description: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.

name: Faceless Summoner
description: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.

name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
description: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy     to your hand that costs (1).
flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.
name: Shadowcaster

description: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.
name: Forlorn Stalker

description: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'
name: Demented Frostcaller

description: Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.
name: Shifting Shade

description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!
name: Twilight Flamecaller
Princess Huhuran
description: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle effect.

name: Dark Arakkoa
description:
[x]Taunt
Battlecry: Give your C'Thun
+3/+3 (wherever it is).

name: Usher of Souls
description:
Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1
(wherever it is).
Battlecry: If your C'Thun  has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.
name: Twilight Darkmender

flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING
name: Stormcrack
description: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.
name: Southsea Squidface
Shadow Strike
description: Deal 5 damage to an undamaged character.
Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."
name: Selfless Hero

flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.
name: Rallying Blade
description: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.

flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.
name: Primal Fusion
description: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.

flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?
name: Power Word: Tentacles
description: Give a minion +2/+6.

flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.
name: On the Hunt
description:
Deal 1 damage.
Summon a 1/1 Mastiff.

name: Malkorok
description: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon.

flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.
name: Journey Below
description: Discover a Deathrattle card.

name: Infested Wolf
description: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.

Whenever a character is healed, give your
C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?
name: Hooded Acolyte

flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.
name: Forbidden Ritual
description: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.
name: Forbidden Ancient

description: Overload: (2)
flavor: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!
name: Flamewreathed Faceless

description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: He'll always be our first.
name: Fiery Bat
Feral Rage
description: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.

name: Fandral Staghelm
description: Your Choose One cards have both effects combined.

flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.
name: Evolve
description: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.

name: Eternal Sentinel
description: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.

flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.
name: Divine Strength
description: Give a minion +1/+2.

Battlecry:
Discard a random card. Deathrattle:
Draw a card.
flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.
name: Darkshire Librarian

description: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Democracy in action!
name: Darkshire Councilman

[x]Spell Damage +1
After you cast a spell,
give your C'Thun +1/+1
(wherever it is).
flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.
name: Cult Sorcerer

flavor: Carrion, my wayward grub.
name: Carrion Grub

flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.
name: Blood To Ichor
description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.

name: Bloodsail Cultist
description: Battlecry: If you control a Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.

Taunt
Enrage: +3 Attack.
flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.
name: Bloodhoof Brave

description: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health  to C'Thun's (wherever it is).
flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.
name: Blade of C'Thun
Anomalus
description: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.

flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?
name: A Light in the Darkness
description:
Discover a minion.
Give it +1/+1.
After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".
name: Addled Grizzly
